name: Head
description:
I made this game with the code name "Head" where the concept is to throw your head around to see things you normaly wouldn't.

The game features 6 levels, 7 with the additional 'playground' level, each showing off their own gimmicks. The difficulty ranges from very beginner friendly to very hard, perhaps a little fast?

Keep in mind that this is by far, not a finished project. It's merely a demo to show off the concept.

Nevertheless, I hope you have fun trying it out!
